00036 #define QMI_MAX_POSITION_DATA_NMEA_BUFFER 200
00037 /*
00038  * Name:    PositionDataNMEATlv
00039  *
00040  * Purpose: Structure used to store all Position Data NMEA TLV Value.
00041  *
00042  * Members: TlvPresent         - Boolean indicating the presence of the TLV
00043  *                               in the QMI response
00044  *
00045  *          PositionDataNMEA   - Position Data NMEA value
00046  */
